statements: DELETE FROM glucose_levels WHERE patient_id = 100 AND recorded_time < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM glucose_levels WHERE glucose_level > 200 AND recorded_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-02-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM patient_glucose WHERE patient_id = 101 AND record_time = '2022-01-05 10:30:00'
DELETE FROM patient_glucose WHERE patient_id = 100 AND record_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM device_info WHERE device_id IN (1, 2, 3);
DELETE FROM glucose_readings WHERE glucose_level < 70 AND reading_time < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
